pageContext.claim: “50,000 [ballots] in another location that's in North Carolina.”
pageContext.analysis: It's unclear what mysterious ballot snafu Trump is complaining about here. A week earlier, there were reports that in North Carolina, 7,272 ballots are classified as "pending cure," meaning there is missing information on the ballot or envelope. Or he is referring to 11,000 inaccurate pre-filled voter registration applications — not ballots —that were sent to North Carolinians from Civitech, a technology vendor that works with companies and campaigns to increase voter registrations, the North Carolina State Board of Elections said in an Oct. 6 press release. Civitech apologized and promised to send out “corrected mailers with blank applications to all affected NC recipients.”
